all.message: {"allmsg":{"extension_name":"HP Client Security Manager","extension_description":"提供安全又方便的網站登入","cmd_addlogin":"新增  至 Password Manager","cmd_openpm":"開啟 Password Manager","cmd_settings":"圖示設定","cmd_help":"說明","cmd_fillin":"填入登入資料","cmd_editprofile":"編輯登入","cmd_addprofile":"新增登入","cmd_chgpsw":"變更密碼...","dpmaxs_txt_title":"HP Client Security","dpmaxs_txt_bodyadd":"您是否想要 Password Manager 記憶{account}密碼於{domain}？","dpmaxs_txt_bodyupd":"您是否想要 Password Manager 更新{account}密碼於{domain}？","dpmaxs_txt_ok":"記憶","dpmaxs_txt_no":"不用了，謝謝","dpmaxs_txt_ne":"永不於此網站","dpmaxs_txt_popup_state":"HP Client Security Manager 延伸未正常運作。","dpmaxs_txt_popup_infoActivate":"HP Client Security Manager 延伸未運作，因為尚未啟動 HP Client Security Manager 外掛程式。","dpmaxs_txt_popup_infoMultiple":"HP Client Security Manager 延伸未運作，因為安裝了多個版本的 HP Client Security Manager 延伸。","dpmaxs_txt_popup_infoWrongVer":"HP Client Security Manager 延伸未運作，因為安裝的 HP Client Security Manager 延伸版本與 HP Client Security Manager 外掛程式不相容。","dpmaxs_txt_popup_actOpen":"開啟 HP Client Security Manager User Console Browser Integration Page，以取得進一步指示。","dpmaxs_txt_popup_actRemove":"僅應啟用一個版本的 HP Client Security Manager 延伸。 任何其他版本均應停用或解除安裝。"},"allres":{}}

dpmaxs_txt_bodyadd.message: 您是否想要 Password Manager 記憶{account}密碼於{domain}？

dpmaxs_txt_bodyupd.message: 您是否想要 Password Manager 更新{account}密碼於{domain}？

dpmaxs_txt_popup_actOpen.message: 開啟 HP Client Security Manager User Console Browser Integration Page，以取得進一步指示。

dpmaxs_txt_popup_actRemove.message: 僅應啟用一個版本的 HP Client Security Manager 延伸。 任何其他版本均應停用或解除安裝。

dpmaxs_txt_popup_infoActivate.message: HP Client Security Manager 延伸未運作，因為尚未啟動 HP Client Security Manager 外掛程式。

dpmaxs_txt_popup_infoMultiple.message: HP Client Security Manager 延伸未運作，因為安裝了多個版本的 HP Client Security Manager 延伸。

dpmaxs_txt_popup_infoWrongVer.message: HP Client Security Manager 延伸未運作，因為安裝的 HP Client Security Manager 延伸版本與 HP Client Security Manager 外掛程式不相容。

dpmaxs_txt_popup_msg.message:
The HP Client Security Manager Chrome extension is not working properly.
For the extension to function properly, check:
1. HP Client Security Manager is installed.
2. The HP Client Security Manager plugin is enabled.
Check browser troubleshooting page in the HP Client Security Manager dashboard.

dpmaxs_txt_popup_state.message: HP Client Security Manager 延伸未正常運作。

extension_description.message: 提供安全又方便的網站登入
